title: The Dark Side of Spirituality, Alex Ebert & Jules Evans
description:
What is the link between spirituality and eugenics? What is the dark side of spirituality? 

This conversation brings together Alex Ebert, singer and songwriter for Edward Sharpe and the Magnetic Zeros, and Jules Evans, philosopher and writer.

Jules will be doing a series of exclusive talks for the Rebel Wisdom Digital Campfire starting Thursday 11th February, to join, check here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
